title: I Like
lyrics:
Tender loving
It's one on one
Don't wanna rush it, nah
Let's take it nice and slow, honey
Caress my body
And hold me tight
Don't let me go, baby
Until I get enough, oooh

(Baby tonight) baby tonight
(The loving is right) the loving is right
(You know how I like it)
You know how I like it, yeah
(You know how I want it)
You know just what I want, baby

I like the way you tease me
I like the way you squeeze me
I like the way you touch me
I like the way you sex me

Turn down the lights, baby
Take off what you have on
Let's do it to the music
Come bring your loving on
My body's yearning for you, baby
For a taste of your love
Only you can fill this appetite
Come on and satisfy my love

(Baby tonight) baby tonight
(The loving is right) the loving is right
(You know how I like it)
You know how I like it
(You know how I want it)
You know how I want it

I like the way you tease me
I like the way you squeeze me
I like the way you touch me
I like the way you sex me
I like the way you tease me
I like the way you squeeze me
I like the way you touch me
I like the way you sex me

Baby, don't you hold back on me (can't nobody do it like you do it)
Give me everything you've got (got my body yearning)
I wanna give you all my loving (baby let's do it to the music)
It will be good to the last drop (the last drop)
Baby, don't you hold back on me (come on baby don't you hold back on me)
Give me everything you've got (give me everything you got)
I wanna give you all my loving (you know I wanna give you all my loving)
It will be good to the last drop (the last drop)

I like the way you tease me
(I like the way you tease me, baby)
I like the way you squeeze me
(I like the way you hold me tight)
I like the way you touch me
(I like it when you love me right, baby)
I like the way you sex me (making love all through the night)
I like the way you tease me (come on, come on baby)
I like the way you squeeze me
I like the way you touch me
I like the way you sex me (come on , come on, baby)
I like the way you tease me
I like the way you squeeze me
I like the way you touch me
I like the way you sex me
